trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with a workflow change that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados associados a uma alteração no fluxo de trabalho que ocorre durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When a workflow change occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Changed> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma alteração de fluxo de trabalho ocorre durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho e uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associados com o fluxo de trabalho instância inclui um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Changed> evento, o tempo de execução de conjuntos de infraestrutura de rastreamento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs> no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> que ele envia para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs> é usado somente pelo tempo de execução do serviço de rastreamento para transmitir informações em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as alterações que ocorreram na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" /> objects that specify the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" /> objetos que especificam as alterações que ocorreram na instância de fluxo de trabalho.
Obtém a definição de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que representa a atividade raiz da instância do fluxo de trabalho.
